attributes.action: keep the act of settlement in place and not to interfere with the monarchy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
there has been talk that the prime minister is considering changing the act of settlement to allow non church of england subjects to be able to ascend the throne and to alow women to take precidence over men in line to the throne if they are born first.
on the surface it sounds good but this law has stood for over 300 years and is part of our tradition.
everybody accepts the law as it is now but if changed it will only cause friction among all the fractions of this society that the monarchy holds together.
what with the credit crunch and all the other problems the country is facing right now i think the prime minister would have better things to do than mess with our monarchy.
